about_the_game: The FAME Demo contains 1hr of the main story to play, some features are not present in the demo that are in the full release. Please note that all scenes, art & dialogue are subject to change. Expect minor bugs when playing such as missing icons or names in dialogue, options breaking soft locking the game & etc.

content_descriptors.notes: Fame contains mature themes that involve sexual acts or images that depict nudity. The game contains themes of murder & confronting themes that may not be suitable to everyone.

detailed_description: The FAME Demo contains 1hr of the main story to play, some features are not present in the demo that are in the full release. Please note that all scenes, art & dialogue are subject to change. Expect minor bugs when playing such as missing icons or names in dialogue, options breaking soft locking the game & etc.
